TestDescription.name: PHP4 multiple vulnerabilities

WASPDescription.DetailsFormat: The script has been tested with these parameter values : ${combinations}

TestDescription.Description: [coolbox][dark]This alert was generated using only banner information. It may be a false positive. [/dark][/coolbox][break]PHP have released an upgrade to address multiple vulnerabilities, including integer overflow issues that have been reported to affect PHP4 and bundled software. [break][break][navy] Affected PHP versions (up to 4.3.2).[/navy][break]
TestDescription.Impact: Denial of service or ultimately arbitrary code execution.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade PHP to the latest version.
